trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Berlin
There was one other sighting in Berlin on or around August 25th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were returning from the park with our son, we were walking. We ran into our neighbor and our neighbor first noticed one light and than another at that piont I turned to see the lights, at this piont another apeared than another for a total of four lights in a straight line. The first light stopped than so on. The lights all stopped in a formation of a diamond than one disappeared and the formation was that of a triangle. This was all cuaght on video. August 25, 2013 8:30pm. Berlin, NH.
